casebody.data:
CAMERON
v.
MERISEL, INC. No. 227PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 12, 2004. William W. Pollock, Gloria Taft Becker, Raleigh, for Merisel, Inc., et al. Steven B. Epstein, John D. Burns, Raleigh, for Cameron.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of October 2004 by Plaintiffs for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiffs shall have up to and including the 29th day of November 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of October 2004."
